dict.string:
Changes the switcher's home screen card background style. Set the style to your liking.
* Normal = 0 * Hidden = 1 * Black = 2 * Blur = 3 * UltraLight (Blur only) = 4 * SemiLight (Blur only) = 5 * FlatSemiLight (Blur only) = 6 * Light (Blur only) = 7 * Dark (Blur only) = 8 * UltraLight (Tinted Blur) = 9 * SemiLight (Tinted Blur) = 10 * FlatSemiLight (Tinted Blur) = 11 * Light (Tinted Blur) = 12 * Dark (Tinted Blur) = 14 * UltraLight (Tint only) = 15 * SemiLight (Tint only) = 16 * FlatSemiLight (Tint only) = 17 * Light (Tint only) = 18 * Dark (Tint only) = 19 * Background Light (Blur only) = 20 * Background Light (Tinted Blur) = 21 * Background Light (Tint only) = 22 * Foreground Light (Blur only) = 23 * Foreground Light (Tinted Blur) = 24 * Foreground Light (Tint only) = 25 * Switcher Background Light (Blur only) = 26 * Switcher Background Light (Tinted Blur) = 27 * Switcher Background Light (Tint only) = 28
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 9.0.2 & 9.3.3. (8-13-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
Switcher - HS Card Background Style ₈₋₁₃₋₁₆
Set Style As Per Glossary Above...
